attributes.name: Luck
attributes.parsed_description: +0.5% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.

attributes.name: Gourmand's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of raw and cooked food by 5%.

attributes.name: Prospector's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of ores, ingots, and pickaxes by 5%.

attributes.name: Tanner's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of rawhide, leather, and skinning knives by 5%.

attributes.name: Mercenary's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of weapons and ammunition by 5%.

attributes.name: Lumberjack's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of wood, timber, and logging axes by 5%.

attributes.name: Plentiful Shells
attributes.parsed_description: When hit with a rifle 5.0% chance you gain ammo.

attributes.name: Plentiful Arrows
attributes.parsed_description: When hit with a bow 5.0% chance you gain an arrow.

attributes.name: Quartermaster's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of armor by 5%.

attributes.name: Azoth Attuned
attributes.parsed_description: When you gain Azoth gain 3.0% more.

attributes.name: Loyalty
attributes.parsed_description: When you gain faction tokens gain 3.0% more.

attributes.name: Quarryman's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of stone, blocks, gems, and pickaxes 5%.

attributes.name: Weaver's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of fiber, cloth, and sickles by 5%.

attributes.name: Alchemist's Burden
attributes.parsed_description: Reduce the weight of alchemy reagents, potions, and sickles by 5%.
